title: Jewellery
description: Precision lighting for luxury jewellery stores that enhances the brilliance of precious stones and creates an atmosphere of elegance.

projects.name: Bluestone
projects.description: Premium jewellery store lighting design featuring precision spotlights and elegant ambient lighting to showcase precious stones and metals.
features: High CRI LED spotlights for accurate color rendering
Adjustable beam angles for different product types
Smart dimming controls for mood adjustment
